snippet: Home builders are experimenting with prefabricated cottages designed to be erected in the backyard as stand-alone residences for elderly family members.
abstract: Home builders are experimenting with prefabricated cottages designed to be erected in the backyard as stand-alone residences for elderly family members.

headline.main: In the Backyard, Grandma's New Apartment
headline.print_headline: Keep an Ailing Relative at Home, Almost
